aeeb3184-ccf6-4fce-aa4e-45e9bac8e830.name: string
aeeb3184-ccf6-4fce-aa4e-45e9bac8e830.description: Receives a string to be URI component-encoded.

name: string/URI component encoder
description:
URI component-encodes the received string.

Example:
1. "hello world"@1 received via `string`
2. "hello%20world"@1 sent via `encoded`
